data.1: Margherita Pizza - Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
data.2: Pepperoni Pizza - Topped with pepperoni slices, mozzarella, and tomato sauce.
data.3: Veggie Pizza - Loaded with bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, and spinach.
data.4: BBQ Chicken Pizza - Grilled chicken, BBQ sauce, red onions, and mozzarella.
data.5: Hawaiian Pizza - A sweet and savory combo with ham, pineapple, and mozzarella.
data.6: Margarita with a Twist - Add a drizzle of balsamic glaze to the Margherita for extra flavor.
data.7: Four Cheese Pizza - A delicious blend of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and goat cheese.
data.8: Buffalo Chicken Pizza - Spicy buffalo sauce, grilled chicken, and mozzarella.
data.9: Meat Lovers Pizza - Loaded with sausage, bacon, pepperoni, and ground beef.
data.10: Pesto Pizza - Pesto sauce base topped with mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, and arugula.
